traits.name: Ambusher
traits.text: The jermlaine has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The jermlaine can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The jermlaine has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and that ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Speak With Rats
traits.text: At will, a jermlaine can produce an effect like that of a speak with animals spell, except that it enables communication only with rats and giant rats.

actions.name: Mini Dart
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d2+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Mini Spear
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: -2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4-4) piercing damage.
